Uses of Interface
org.apache.hadoop.zebra.io.TableScanner

Packages that use TableScanner
org.apache.hadoop.zebra.io Physical I/O management of Hadoop Zebra Tables. 
 

Uses of TableScanner in org.apache.hadoop.zebra.io
 

Methods in org.apache.hadoop.zebra.io that return TableScanner
 TableScanner BasicTable.Reader.getScanner(BasicTable.Reader.RangeSplit split, boolean closeReader)
          Get a scanner that reads a consecutive number of rows as defined in the BasicTable.Reader.RangeSplit object, which should be obtained from previous calls of BasicTable.Reader.rangeSplit(int).
 TableScanner BasicTable.Reader.getScanner(boolean closeReader, BasicTable.Reader.RowSplit rowSplit)
          Get a scanner that reads a consecutive number of rows as defined in the BasicTable.Reader.RowSplit object.
 TableScanner BasicTable.Reader.getScanner(org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable beginKey, org.apache.hadoop.io.BytesWritable endKey, boolean closeReader)
          Get a scanner that reads all rows whose row keys fall in a specific range.
